channel.title: Dump of itemlist and item images
channel.description:
How would I go on about dumping all item names and ids of RuneScape for example? How would I go on about dumping item images, instead of dumping them from RuneScape's grandexchange site(all item images aren't there).
Please help me? :)

item.title: Dump of itemlist and item images
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

While you are probably right, rendering the images at runtime seems like a waste of resources. But who am I to question Jagex.

Read full topic
item.source: Dump of itemlist and item images

item.title: Dump of itemlist and item images
item.dc:creator: @peterbjornx peterbjornx
item.description:
@peterbjornx wrote:

First of all items are NOT images , they are three dimensional models, and the client renders them into 2D images using three settings from the Object Configuration Data (obj.dat,obj.idx) files , these are : Horizontal rotation,Vertical rotation,and Zoom.

Read full topic
item.source: Dump of itemlist and item images

item.title: Dump of itemlist and item images
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

You would write a program to load the cache files, then output the images as PNG files.

Read full topic
item.source: Dump of itemlist and item images
